```{r}
df_filtrado <- df %>% select(-Fecha.y.hora)

for (col in names(df_filtrado)) {
  hist(df_filtrado[[col]],
       main = paste("Histograma de", col),
       xlab = col,
       col = "lightblue",
       breaks = 30)
}
```

